posts.postText:
Offender name?: SHADOW 
Which Server?: JailBreak
Offender's Steam ID?: STEAM_0:1:13804137 
What the Offender did?: RDM on multiple occasions
Admins on?: None
Proof?: http://img132.imageshack.us/f/bajailhellsgamersser200.jpg/
           http://img840.imageshack.us/f/bajailhellsgamersser200j.jpg/

1st Offense: Told all prisoners to fist fight each other and then killed all prisoners, even though all of them were fist fighting.

2nd Offense: I was ordered back into my cell so guards could look for another escaping prisoner. I got in and someone volunteered to guard. Shadow came up to my cell and killed me even though I didnt do anything wrong.

edit: After I told him he had a ban request up for him, he is now saying it was an accident :P
